channel.title: Comments on: What in the Actual Hell, Los Angeles
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: Jane Harrington
item.dc:creator: Jane Harrington
item.description: Gee, with all the abandoned light industrial sites, you have to pick the properties that have history and character, so you can be sure of creating psychological problems for the surrounding community. Unbelievable.
item.content:encoded: Gee, with all the abandoned light industrial sites, you have to pick the properties that have history and character, so you can be sure of creating psychological problems for the surrounding community. Unbelievable.
